---
title: "LLM Slide Decks"
---

This site demonstrates multiple ways to generate slide decks with the help of large language models. The source code is on [GitHub](https://github.com/nbrosse/llm-slide-deck), and the companion blog post is here: [LLM Slide Decks](https://nbrosse.github.io/llm-slides/llm-slides.html).

Starting from a real‑world presentation — the EDF Producer Booklet (FET17CR) — I asked Google Gemini 2.5 Pro to reproduce the first pages in several formats:

- Google Slides (Google Slides API)
- PowerPoint (python-pptx)
- HTML/CSS
- Quarto/Reveal.js

Explore the demos below:

- **Reveal.js (Quarto)**: [quarto/presentation](quarto/presentation.qmd)
- **Raw HTML/CSS**: [raw/presentation](raw/presentation.html)
- **Google Slides (PDF export)**: [google/google_slides](google/google_slides.qmd)
- **PowerPoint (PPTX and PDF)**: [powerpoint/powerpoint_slides](powerpoint/powerpoint_slides.qmd)
